name: Turtle Town '27
description:
Ah, Turtletown - a beautiful town located on a serene tropical island. A lovely place full of turtles and other creatures, but mostly turtles - that is, until the FUCKIN ugly ladybugs swarmed in. The inhabitants of Turtletown were already speciesist towards our favorite spider girl Joulei, and she already had to deal with her infamous ladybug rival Lacii, but this infestation takes it a whole new level!

Joulei's long-time turtle friend Dave, unable to fight off the ladybug threat on his own, calls upon Joulei's 15th sister Lewcynda for assistance! She may be a formidable force, but little does she know that the ladybugs have something dastardly planned...

-----------------------------------------------------

A parody of the infamous Hong Kong '97, except set in the world of @jouleicentral.

  • Run around as "Lewcynda" and take on the ladybug threat! Shoot explosive webs, eat flies, and kick ladybug butt! But watch out, I hear murmurs regarding the revival of the fearsome Chuan Wei Fu Xie...
  • Track your high score! (saved in the registry under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\PJ's Cool Stuff\Turtle Town 27)
  • Choose from 6 different music tracks! Better than HK97's 1...
  • Enable Unreal Engine mode for UNREAL graphics! You can also set it so that dying sends you back to the gameplay after the high score screen instead of sending you back to the title like HK97.

-----------------------------------------------------

CONTENT WARNING: Potentially disturbing insect gore image upon game over. Probably still better than Hong Kong 97's LITERAL dead body pic, but I figured I'd note it.
